definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: The question is whether the dedicated have had more influence than the image- flashers .
sentences.chinese: 問題是無論如何對閱讀的這種關注比圖片根由影響。

sentences.english: Suppose I hold up a photograph of a beach with nobody on it.
sentences.chinese: 假設我拿着一張畫着無人海灘的圖片。

sentences.english: The Soyuz spacecraft appears at the bottom left.
sentences.chinese: 聯盟號宇宙飛船出現在圖片的左下方。

sentences.english: Again, you'll have to choose iamges relevant to your own topic.
sentences.chinese: 還是如此，你得選擇和自己主題相關的圖片。

sentences.english: The hexagonal pot shown in this picture is painted with five-colors and was put to auction at Sotheby's in the Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 畫上五色彩的六角盆圖片在荷蘭的蘇富比拍賣。

sentences.english: They have just put some pictures on a display board.
sentences.chinese: 他們剛把一些圖片放到展覽板上。

sentences.english: And here is another, another image by Evans of the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 這是他拍的另一張橋的圖片。

sentences.english: The mound was not visible in an ASTER image acquired in late 2008.
sentences.chinese: 這塊高地在2008年底拍攝的圖片中還看沒有。

sentences.english: Inspired by the picture of a valkyrie I found on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 從網路上找到的北歐戰神使女的圖片得到的靈感。

sentences.english: Scrolling right will reveal the rest of the panoramic image.
sentences.chinese: 將圖片右移可以看到全景圖的其他部分。

sentences.english: The red packaging and the plastic lid can be seen in the picture.
sentences.chinese: 圖片可以看出，在紅色的包裝和塑料蓋。

sentences.english: I saw this picture and couldn't resist posting it.
sentences.chinese: 我看到這張圖片便不由自主地把它張貼出來。

sentences.english: Beutiful photos and very powerful representation of a great Nation.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的圖片，這也是對一個大國的強有力的展示。

sentences.english: Pictures of the counterfeit and authentic products may be viewed on the FDA press release.
sentences.chinese: FDA新聞通稿中有假冒產品和正宗產品的圖片。

sentences.english: All four infrared detectors aboard WISE were used to make this image.
sentences.chinese: 船上所有四個紅外探測器被用來獲得這一圖片。

definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
official website (abbr. for 官方網站|官方网站[guan1 fang1 wang3 zhan4])
variant of 聯結|联结[lian2 jie2]
to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
